LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information into file. In ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version is fully operational. There is only one limitation – only 100 payments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.SigningSecretKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify webhook 'Signing Secret' from webhook detail's paqge.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.SupportMultiCurrency.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: By default plugin uses the primary currency of store, but you can enabled to use the customer's currency of the order.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.CreateOrderMode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the creating mode for nop order (after or before payment).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.IgnoreOrderItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Don't send order items on Stripe. Customer will not see products from the order on Stripe Hosted Checkout Page site, he will see only total amount. We recomend you to use this option because you will avoid 'issue with rounding'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.PaymentMethods
LocaleResource.Value: The list of supported payment methods on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableCreditCard.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Credit Cards on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableBancontact.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Bancontact on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableBancontact.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Bancontact supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableiDEAL.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable iDEAL on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableiDEAL.Description
LocaleResource.Value: iDEAL supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableGiroPay.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable GiroPay on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableGiroPay.Description
LocaleResource.Value: GiroPay supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableSofort.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Sofort on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableSofort.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Sofort supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableSepaDebit.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable SEPA Direct Debit on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableSepaDebit.Description
LocaleResource.Value: SEPA Direct Debit supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnablePrzelewy24.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Przelewy24 on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnablePrzelewy24.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Przelewy24 supports only Euro and PLZ and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableEPS.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable EPS on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableEPS.Description
LocaleResource.Value: EPS supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableAliPay.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable AliPay on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableAliPay.Description
LocaleResource.Value: AliPay supports only Euro and 'Authorize and Capture' mode.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableBacsDirectDebit.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Bacs Direct Debit on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableAfterpayorClearpay.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Afterpay or Clearpay on the Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.Description.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Extra information about a product which will appear on your customer’s credit card statement. In the case that multiple products are billed at once, the first statement descriptor will be used. Only available on products of type=service. By default your customer will see this message 'NopCommerce Store'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.Description.Comment
LocaleResource.Value: Statement descriptors are limited to 22 characters, cannot use the special characters <, >, ', ", or *.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.EnableEmailReceipts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Stripe will send payment or refund receipts automatically.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.StoreTransactionDetails.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Store transaction details in the order notes. You will be able to see Stripe fees, Stripe transanction ID, etc.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.WebhookDescription
LocaleResource.Value: Important! Create Webhook from this page using the button 'Get webhook ID'. You need to have the live URL, not localhost. After it copy webhook secret key from Stripe Dashboard back to this page. Only Webhook can change the order payment status.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.WebhookError
LocaleResource.Value: Webhook was not created (see details in the log)

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.RemoveWebhookError
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Can't remove Webhook Id={0}. Remove it manually from Stripe Dashboard.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.OldLibrary
LocaleResource.Value: Error. You has another plugin for Stripe with old Stripe.net.dll. Download the last release or uninstall and remove it from the folder 'Plugins'. This plugin uses the new library Stripe.net.dll.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to Stripe Hosted Checkout Payment Page.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.Redirection
LocaleResource.Value: Redirection to Stripe Hosted Checkout Payment Page...

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.PaymentMethodDescription
LocaleResource.Value: After confirming order you will be redirected to Stripe Hosted Checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.DescriptionError
LocaleResource.Value: You have an error with this payment, please write to support and we'll try to help you.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeHostedCheckout.Error.EmptyShoppingCart
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Empty shopping cart. Contact to store's owner and tell about this problem.
